caption.p: Classification of polyunsaturated fatty acids and the effects of omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids on physiological processes in the skin; ALA, alpha-linolenic acid; DHA, docosahexaenoic acid; EPA, eicosapentaenoic acid; LA, linoleic acid; GLA, gamma-linolenic acid; AA, arachidonic acid; PG, prostaglandins; PGI, prostacyclins; TXA, thromboxanes; LT, leukotrienes (own work based on [ 151, 153, 154]).
